name: Knightly Gold and Glory
description:
A top down arcade action game where you try to survive and get as much gold as possible in the arena.

Use the gold you get from defeating enemies to buy new weapons and upgrades in the shop

Controls for Web/PC version:

  • WASD for movement
  • Left Mouse button to attack
  • Space to dodge roll
  • 1 and 2 to swap between first and second weapon
  • ESC to open the pause menu

The android version is an older version so expect some less polish
